# [Interview #255: Robert Jordan's Blog: IT'S BEEN AWHILE, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=255#25)

#### Robert Jordan

Well, not so long as some of the more recent posts, but times is running short, guys. See you again soon, I hope.

All my best,

RJ
